conversations.body_text: Hi Preed2014,     We will send HS Pro out this week.

Can you give me an estimated delivery date please?


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone
Hi Preed2014,  I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I have confirmed that your package has been delivered. Have you received it?  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSELI2425275782YQ
